Bash(git -C "e:/Github/hybe-hydra" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Campaign refactoring, compose flow improvements, and artist management

## Campaign Pages
- Refactor campaign detail page with better data fetching
- Simplify analytics page structure
- Improve info page layout
- Add assets page for campaign media management

## Compose Flow
- Enhance script, image, music, and effect steps
- Improve InlineComposeFlow with better state management
- Refactor PersonalizePromptModal for cleaner code

## Artist Management
- Add artist settings page (settings/artists)
- Replace AddArtistModal with new ArtistModal component
- Add artist CRUD API endpoints

## UI Components
- Add inline-tag-input component
- Add keyword-input-popover component

## Backend
- Update compose-engine effects registry
- Improve video renderer service
- Enhance slideshow renderer engine

## Other
- Update i18n translations (ko/en)
- Add generate-image-prompt API
- Improve Google search integration
- Update workflow store and queries

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C "e:/Github/hybe-hydra" add app/api/v1/fast-cut/images/search/route.ts app/api/v1/fast-cut/audio/analyze/route.ts components/features/create/fast-cut/FastCutImageStep.tsx components/features/create/fast-cut/InlineFastCutFlow.tsx lib/google-search.ts components/admin/prompt-refiner-chat.tsx package.json package-lock.json)

Bash(git -C "e:/Github/hybe-hydra" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Improve Fast Cut image search with dimensions, copyright filter

- Display image dimensions badge on search results
- Remove Mixed tab from image source selection (Web Search only)
- Change Google image size filter from "large" to "huge" (1024x768+)
- Add Creative Commons license filter to exclude copyrighted images
- Add rights parameter support to Google search functions

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash("C:\Program Files\Amazon\AWSCLIV2\aws.exe" ecr create-repository --repository-name hydra-compose-engine --region ap-southeast-2)
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "& ''C:\Program Files\Amazon\AWSCLIV2\aws.exe'' secretsmanager describe-secret --secret-id hydra/compose-engine --region ap-southeast-2")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "& ''C:\Program Files\Amazon\AWSCLIV2\aws.exe'' secretsmanager describe-secret --secret-id hydra/s3-config --region ap-southeast-2")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "& ''C:\Program Files\Amazon\AWSCLIV2\aws.exe'' secretsmanager restore-secret --secret-id hydra/compose-engine --region ap-southeast-2")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "& ''C:\Program Files\Amazon\AWSCLIV2\aws.exe'' secretsmanager restore-secret --secret-id hydra/s3-config --region ap-southeast-2")
Bash("C:\Program Files\Amazon\AWSCLIV2\aws.exe" logs describe-log-groups --region ap-southeast-2 --query "logGroups[*].logGroupName" --output text)
Bash("C:\Program Files\Amazon\AWSCLIV2\aws.exe" batch describe-job-queues --region ap-southeast-2 --query "jobQueues[*].{name:jobQueueName,state:state,status:status}" --output table)
Bash("C:\Program Files\Amazon\AWSCLIV2\aws.exe" batch list-jobs --job-queue hydra-compose-queue --job-status RUNNING --region ap-southeast-2 --output table)
Bash("C:\Program Files\Amazon\AWSCLIV2\aws.exe" batch list-jobs --job-queue hydra-compose-queue --job-status SUCCEEDED --region ap-southeast-2 --max-results 5 --output table)
Bash("C:\Program Files\Amazon\AWSCLIV2\aws.exe" batch list-jobs --job-queue hydra-compose-gpu-queue --job-status SUCCEEDED --region ap-southeast-2 --max-results 5 --output json)
Bash("C:\Program Files\Amazon\AWSCLIV2\aws.exe" batch list-jobs --job-queue hydra-compose-gpu-queue --job-status FAILED --region ap-southeast-2 --max-results 5 --output json)

Bash("C:\Program Files\Amazon\AWSCLIV2\aws.exe" batch describe-jobs --jobs "48e17f19-0247-4e41-97f3-058fddb0bcd0" --region ap-southeast-2 --query "jobs[0].{jobId:jobId,status:status,statusReason:statusReason,startedAt:startedAt,stoppedAt:stoppedAt}" --output table)
Bash("C:\Program Files\Amazon\AWSCLIV2\aws.exe" batch list-jobs --job-queue hydra-compose-gpu-queue --region ap-southeast-2 --max-results 3 --output json)

Bash(timeout 30 bash -c 'while true; do status=$(""C:\Program Files\Amazon\AWSCLIV2\aws.exe"" batch describe-jobs --jobs ""c08c5e26-5a75-4e30-833a-b803db403e97"" --region ap-southeast-2 --query ""jobs[0].status"" --output text 2>&1); echo ""Status: $status""; if [[ ""$status"" == ""SUCCEEDED"" ]] || [[ ""$status"" == ""FAILED"" ]]; then break; fi; sleep 5; done')
